body_html:
I tried with the following patch and it seems to build successfully:

diff --git a/third_party/llvm/llvm.BUILD b/third_party/llvm/llvm.BUILD
index bd82081..5e8ff70 100644
--- a/third_party/llvm/llvm.BUILD
+++ b/third_party/llvm/llvm.BUILD
@@ -251,6 +251,7 @@ cc_library(
         "LLVM_ENABLE_STATS",
         "__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS",
         "__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS",
+       "__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS",
         "_DEBUG",
         "LLVM_BUILD_GLOBAL_ISEL",
     ],

body:
I tried with the following patch and it seems to build successfully:
```diff
diff --git a/third_party/llvm/llvm.BUILD b/third_party/llvm/llvm.BUILD
index bd82081..5e8ff70 100644
--- a/third_party/llvm/llvm.BUILD
+++ b/third_party/llvm/llvm.BUILD
@@ -251,6 +251,7 @@ cc_library(
         "LLVM_ENABLE_STATS",
         "__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS",
         "__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS",
+       "__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS",
         "_DEBUG",
         "LLVM_BUILD_GLOBAL_ISEL",
     ],
```
